name: slag landfill construction | slag landfill | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2930/documentation

slag compartment for bottom ash from municipal solid waste incinerator. The compartment is a sealed-off part of a sanitary landfill. 375'000 m3 volume. Construction phase is 5 years; use phase is 30 years; aftercare phase is 75 years. Average waste density 1500 kg/m3.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



infrastructure materials for landfill construction, operation and aftercare. Including access road.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Waste Treatment & Recycling

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Specific to the technology encountered in Switzerland in 2000. Well applicable to modern landfilling practices in Europe, North America or Japan.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Slag compartment for MSWI bottom ash as part of a Swiss sanitary landfill. With base seal, leachate collection system. Recultivation and monitoring for 75 years after closure.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: assumed geometry and area with legal minimal material inputs
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: data from one literature source on sanitary landfill, adapted to features of this landfill type
